text: Hackney Wick is an area in east London, England. Hackney is next to a park called Victoria park . Did you know there is a river in hackney? If you are looking for food there is a market close to fish island. If your looking for houses in 2023 fish island [ which is in hackney wick ] has built new houses. Schools are developing and getting better . conveniently, Stratford is next to hackney . Every year there is a hackney half which most people go and run . In the hackney half people cheer each other on even if they don't know the person . Category:Areas of London Category:London Borough of Hackney
title: Hackney Wick
